name: The Spider Slaying and Prophecy Fulfilling Chosen One of SPLORR!!
name_original: The Spider Slaying and Prophecy Fulfilling Chosen One of SPLORR!!
description:
This is my entry for Krassjam 16.

The theme I picked was:

A game where you go to school with spiders and fulfill prophecies.

Doesn't seem to work from the itch.io app.

Also, windows protector thinks it is unsafe.

Meh.

Source code at: https://github.com/playdeezgames/TGGD_KJ16
